events.name: eds-filter-tag-selected
events.description: fired on filter tag select/press, ONLY in 'commerce' theme

properties.name: color
properties.description: Option to set the color of filter tag {outline|fill}  Default color is outline.

properties.name: filterTagText
properties.description: Text to display in the filter tag

properties.name: isSelected
properties.description: boolean to toggle filter tag selection in commerce theme

properties.name: type
properties.description:
types of filter tag:

- high-severity
- high-severity-alt
- moderate-severity
- moderate-severity-alt
- low-severity
- low-severity-alt-a
- success
- info-option-1
- info-option-2
- info-option-3
- info-option-4
- info-option-5
- info-option-6
- info-option-7
- info-option-8
- info-option-9
- info-option-10
- info-option-11

EDSFilterTag.description:
The **filter tag** element is a visual representation of a
keyword or phrase that the user has input for purposes of filtering the scope
of content displayed in the application interface at any given time. Multiple
filter tags may be employed at the same time, typically displayed in a
grouping, establishing combined parameters to further narrow the scope of
content displayed. Filter tags may be dismissed individually by the user,
causing the scope of content displayed to broadens a result.
EDSFilterTag.name: Filter Tag
EDSFilterTag.usage:
```html
Tag label 1
 ``` Filter tag has 1 slot that you can use: filter-tag-labels `filter-tag-labels` should only have single label or label | value pair in filter tag. Please note that the input attribute `filter-tag-text` has been removed. Developer needs to use `filter-tag-labels` slot to add text to filter tag component. Also, multipleFilterTagLabels is not a property of filter tag component. It is created for the demo purpose only and does not reflect in the code snippet. Input attribute `type` can be used to define filter tag type as below. ```html
Tag label 1
 ``` The following css variables are available for styling : CSS Variable | Description :----------------|:------------- --eds-filter-tag-text-color-outline | Class for text color when color is outline --eds-filter-tag-text-color-fill | Class for text color when color is fill --eds-filter-tag-alternate-1-text-color | Class for first alternate text color when color is fill --eds-filter-tag-alternate-2-text-color | Class for second alternate text color when color is fill --eds-filter-tag-alternate-1-icon-color | Class for first alternate icon color when color is fill --eds-filter-tag-alternate-2-icon-color | Class for second alternate icon color when color is fill --eds-filter-tag-icon-color-outline | Class for closed icon color when color is outline --eds-filter-tag-icon-color-fill | Class for closed icon color when color is fill --eds-filter-tag-border-color | Class for border color when color is outline --eds-filter-tag-border-color-focus | Class for border color on focus --eds-filter-tag-background-color-fill | Class for background color when color is fill --eds-filter-tag-high-severity-background-color | Class to render background color for high severity tag --eds-filter-tag-high-severity-alt-background-color | Class to render background color for high severity alternate tag --eds-filter-tag-moderate-severity-background-color | Class to render background color for moderate severity tag --eds-filter-tag-moderate-severity-alt-background-color | Class to render background color for moderate severity alternate tag --eds-filter-tag-low-severity-background-color | Class to render background color for low severity tag --eds-filter-tag-low-severity-alt-a-background-color | Class to render background color for low severity alternate a tag --eds-filter-tag-success-background-color | Class to render background color for success tag --eds-filter-tag-info-option-1-background-color | Class to render background color for info option 1 tag --eds-filter-tag-info-option-2-background-color | Class to render background color for info option 2 tag --eds-filter-tag-info-option-3-background-color | Class to render background color for info option 3 tag --eds-filter-tag-info-option-4-background-color | Class to render background color for info option 4 tag --eds-filter-tag-info-option-5-background-color | Class to render background color for info option 5 tag --eds-filter-tag-info-option-6-background-color | Class to render background color for info option 6 tag --eds-filter-tag-info-option-7-background-color | Class to render background color for info option 7 tag --eds-filter-tag-info-option-8-background-color | Class to render background color for info option 8 tag --eds-filter-tag-info-option-9-background-color | Class to render background color for info option 9 tag --eds-filter-tag-info-option-10-background-color | Class to render background color for info option 10 tag --eds-filter-tag-info-option-11-background-color | Class to render background color for info option 11 tag --eds-filter-tag-outline-pipe-color | Class to render pipe color for outline colored button with multiple labels --eds-filter-tag-fill-pipe-color | Class to render pipe color for filled colored button with multiple labels --eds-filter-tag-border-color-fill | Class to render the border color when color is fill --eds-filter-tag-icon-color-selected | Class to render the icon color when tag is selected or pressed in commerce theme --eds-filter-tag-background-color-selected | Class to render the background color when tag is selected or pressed in commerce theme --eds-filter-tag-text-color-selected | Class to render the text
